segments.text: Dear Anna . I really love you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to take care of you forever . Will you marry me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . My God ! Are you serious ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I too abrupt ? Did I scare you ? Or you don't want ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ! I have been expecting this moment for a long time . I mean my answer is ' yes ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm so happy . I will try my best to love you and protect you . I promise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I trust you . We'll be happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me wear you this diamond ring .
segments.speaker: S1
